website_summaries.verdict: These video smart glasses are perfect for sports, fishing, hiking, and other outdoor activities.
pros: Can record for up to 90 minutes
32 gigabyte SD card included for plenty of storage
Guaranteed for one year with a 60-day money-back guarantee
cons: Some buyers complain the glasses are a bit heavy
Sound quality isn’t as strong as some other smart glasses

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept
customer_reviews.text: They are a little heavy but they take some good video. Audio is actually pretty good too. Super easy plug and play. Video is extremely clear and colors are vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Mkeller

customer_reviews.title: Really good glasses
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised at the quality of the glasses and the little kit (glasses case, charger, wipe) that came with it. Using the glasses could not be easier and they are light weight. I was also surprised by the quality of the audio. I took a walk through the woods with them and had music playing on headphones and the microphone picked up the music perfectly (even though I didn't intend on that). They are so much fun and worth the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these camera glasses. So easy to use Just put sd card in and turn on. Was fun to see images of what I saw on my computer. Truly a wonderful item that allows you to see images first hand and without using your hands. A must have when you have small children.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dixon

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to film your all your hikes!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fun to use. It comes with the sunglasses, straps, the micro SD card already installed into the glasses, instructions, a nice hard carrying case, and a charging cable. The instructions are easy to read and not confusing like most products out of Asia. The only thing I dislike about these that caused me to drop a star is the glasses stick out too far on the left and right eye creating a gap for light to creep in and it stands out for others to check you out, who then notice the sunglasses aren't normal. I got them for hiking in Germany and for what I wanted them for, they work great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shield2717

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how good these were. I didn't expect this kind of quality at this price. The camera works very well. Video quality was surprisingly good. Certainly easy enough to use, just push the button on the frame to start recording, push again to stop. Can either remove the SD card and plug it into an adaptor, or plug the glasses directly into the computer to transfer the video recordings. Frames are a bit thick but they're cramming a lot of electronics into a very small place. A good alternative to strapping one of those ridiculous 'go-pro' style cameras to your head.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Krippner

customer_reviews.title: Better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: These were a much higher quality product than I was expecting. The video is HD and very clear. There isn't any motion stabilization that I can tell so it jerks around a bit but not too bad. The shades themselves are nice too. I have a wider than average head but the glasses fit good on me. Nice Product! I hope they last. Update: still work fine after a month or so. If you want to use on your motorcycle or with anything that requires a helmet, be aware they will not fit where they rest on your ears. Just too wide. But still a fine product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EWH customer

customer_reviews.title: Mingsung Glasses SG110 1920 X 1080
customer_reviews.text: Mingsung Video Camera Sunglasses Model # SG110 1920 X 1080 Review Part 1 scott warner B07Q4J16Y3 $ 54.00 1-15- 2020 (( BITRATE 9109 )) (( 1920 X 1080 )) ( ONE 1/2 Hr Record Time ) Continuous Recording , In 5 Min Clips (( 32/GB Sd Card )) (( Mov Video File Format )) 450 Mb Per 5 Minute Clips . Highly Recommend 4 1/2 **** Out Of 5 . (( 65 Degree Wide Angle )) scott warner
customer_reviews.author: scott warner

customer_reviews.title: Good video recording, but large frame glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses take great video! Currently, I am using them as a dash cam so to speak while I drive. I haven't tested how long they last yet on a single charge, but hopefully the battery run time is adequate. My only complaint with these glasses is that they are large and do NOT fit well on my face. They are too straight rather than form fitting to my face. It needs more curve to it. I prefer the shape and fit of these glasses  but the video recording quality from the linked glasses is a joke. Overall, these are pretty good video recording glasses.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to watch videos on pc and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality sunglasses. Bought them to use everytime I take my old dogs because there are some crazy paranoic neighbors that want to control where I walk my dogs. Now I use this sunglasses to record my walk so there is proof I am not doing anything unlawful. Easy to install on the computer.The software is already on the sunglasses when you connect to the computer to watch the videos, which is a fantastic idea. No need to search for the software and install it. Once you put it on the computer via usb is there. Super! And it comes with the memory card. Fantastic! Everything is easy..! The video quality is fantastic. Love it.Strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quit working after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to film my son and I at our 3 amusement park vacation. on the first day it shot great footage of us on all the rides. audio / visual quality pretty decent. However, on the second day, after charging all night, the camera stopped working as if it wasn't charged. it would flash then stop flashing which indicated it was not filming. I tinkered around but the problem persisted. it seems it was a faulty battery?!?!?! This was very disappointing. it was a great experiment and I will definitely film again, but not using this product. I should have went all out and purchased a high end pair...but at least....I know for next time
customer_reviews.author: k. matt grodi

customer_reviews.title: Good value, not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, the video quality is good for a head-mounted (and thus shaky) camera. Audio is just OK. I can hear myself well, but others are muted. But my biggest complaint is the size. They are just too narrow and pinch me head, hard, and cannot be adjusted. I certainly cannot wear these for very long, they dig into my head. But that is also a positive. For filming short segments when you are moving a lot, they really stay in place because they are so tight. For the price, I would recommend these, especially for females or anyone with a smaller head. Maybe my bean is just a little too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Good Recording Sunglasses for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are stealthy and adequate considering the price. Unfortunately, they have two basic flaws: 1. I have never been able to get more than 50 minutes of recording time after a full charge. The recording time decreases with each recharge. 2. There is no on/off buzz, just a blue light. There is no notification when the battery discharges completely, so you will unknowingly lose any further recording.
customer_reviews.author: House Boy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Item packaging was nice. Tried turning it one once, and it flashed like it was recording. Then the flashing stopped and it wouldn't shut off. Company also includes an offer to pay you for reviewing their product. Kinda sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie4Fngrs

customer_reviews.title: decent product, but major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but there is a major design flaw--you can't tell if they are on without taking them off and looking at the light on the left side of the frame. It would be better if you could see if they were recording by looking at a light closer to the eyes instead of having to remove the glasses and look to see if they are on or off. Very annoying and makes it hard to know if you are still recording. I consider this a major design flaw that should be easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: JW75

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Ok product maybe
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with power adapter as manual clearly states. Does not operate in a useful way, difficult to get useful footage due to the placement of the camera and the limited angle it shoots (end up not getting the bottom half of your typical visual spectrum), setting adjustments are limited and inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Joshl74

customer_reviews.title: Camera glasses that work
customer_reviews.text: I Like the product, only use once so far, went on a one hour walk, records in five minute increments. Video playback was great. It did stop recording at one hour, hopefully I pushed the button and that’s not what typically happens, I will have to try them again to see for sure but pleased with them so far. Directions could be a little easier to read. Glad it came with the case and memory card. I actually bought them to use while driving, still have yet to try that yet. Again only used once so far but pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: MR TIKI

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Don't like them , not comfortable at all . The camera doesn't work . No I don't like them .
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: To shaky
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to stay still (fully) while recording this will be a nice camera to have. Y you are moving a little bit the final video will give you dizziness ... The quality is espectacular! I purchased those for my sky trip but even the trip in the lift ended up to shaky
customer_reviews.author: The real opinion

customer_reviews.title: Total junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total rip-off. Product doesn’ not work and no way to get it to work. Covid made it impossible to make reasonable effort to see if I could get it to work before window closed. DO NOT PHRCHASE THIS GARBAGE PRODUCT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: It's good for $60
customer_reviews.text: The angle of the camera points too high The button "K1" needs to be bigger, it's too thin and narrow - hard to push You will not know if you took a blurry picture until you open it on your computer If you want to record anything below your line of sight, you have to bend your neck down a lot and keep your head steady. these glasses are good for recording flying kites, movie theaters, painting ceilings, picking fruit from trees, watching birds fly, driving. Im really torn as to whether or not I want to keep these.... the hands-free is nice.
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to record outdoor adventures like fishing and they are very easy to use. One touch of a button and they are working. Surprisingly good audio quality considering we were having long conversations while we were fishing on a windy day and it picked up the conversations great. Still getting used to them but so far, really happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Donald C.

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: these glasses are better than I hoped. they survived 2 days at a theme park on all the rides. The sample video here is poor the actual video is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: A good camera for the money, not too cheap or expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent video quality. The instructions could be better. For example, setting the record time to 1,3,5 or 10 minutes should be noted that the camera will do another 1,3,5 or 10 minute video automatically. You need to press and hold the control button for at least three seconds to turn it off and stop the repeating recording. Also, your finger must solidly press the control button for reliable performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Style and Stealthy
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice on head with a decent sun block and wrap around feel. Wore them for security/safety reasons.a couples of times when meeting up with prospective buyers from some online item sale sites Buyers never noticed they were being recorded. Deleted files of course after all went well with the transactions. Very nice Quality
customer_reviews.author: Robert Portulano

customer_reviews.title: Best camera sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they come with a strap to secure them to your head. I've used them mostly when I bike for long distances. They are easy to operate. I like the fact that it records in 5 minute intervals, this makes it easier to download the footage to your laptop. The videos are amazing and photos too. The battery actually charge faster than expected. They also record well in low light scenes. They include the Micro SD Card which is a nice touch. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They work really good , no one knows there being recorded even the police while i ride my motorcycle and look over and they just as bad as others on there phones texting
customer_reviews.author: Mark Saucier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sound is good, picture is what I expected, perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good if you don't expect HD recording
customer_reviews.text: The camera is kinda simple and requieres a lot of illumination to record in good quality, don't expect hi quality audio recording too. But is a nice product, the carrying case is pretty cool and the product fulfills its purpose if you want to record while you're doing any sport or if you don't want to buy a dashcam (also looks stylish).
customer_reviews.author: Mario Ramazzini

customer_reviews.title: Really good sunglasses!  excellent video and audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical due to the low price. I was pleasantly surprised. These are actually very good sunglasses, and the video and audio are excellent. I used to use dash cams in my cars, but now I have something for everywhere. This will be on my gift list for this year, to give out to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: pedalyurassoff

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a junk. I didn't even get to record anything but one darn 5 minute video. Never got to see it, since the blue lights on glasses started blinking rapidly. It never worked. And on top of that, if you are planning on transfer pictures or videos to an iPad 2nd generation or with iOS uodated to 13+ the adapters won't work. Total junk!
customer_reviews.author: JESUS A BURCIAGA

customer_reviews.title: If you want to record on the go, this is the camera for you!
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired USAF PJ. (Google it) I have seen many forms of surveillance equipment, soooooo that being said, if you want something that absolutely works, is cheap and clear on visual and audio, this is it!!!!! JUST DON'T MOVE YOUR HEAD SO MUCH IF YOU ARE RECORDING AN IMPORTANT EVENT!!! Stay still when you need to. Not that it is blurry, it's just nicer to watch the video after without all the motion.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed with Video, audio, and photo quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of the video, photo, and even audio quality. I have several action cameras, these video glasses are just as good. Best of all they are easy to use, easy to wear, easy to connect to download content. Great Job!
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Great HD camera glasses
customer_reviews.text: This glasses have a lot to offer. First: It will take up to 128gb SD card. Second: Very fast recharging if you use USB hub or a power adapter (NO PC). You can use also portable USB power bank. Third: Records very clear pictures and sound (only within 20 to 40 feet). I love to use it around grand kids, and they don't even know it. Displayed on 4K TV very nice. Adapts and stabilized to sudden moves quickly. Pick up a little wind static, when you walk fast. Overall it's a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav

customer_reviews.title: may cause motion sickness
customer_reviews.text: I want to start with all the pro's. The glasses look great. They fit well. They're easy to use, easy to charge, picture is great. Everything is great. The only thing I would offer as a suggestion for improvement would be some sort of stabilization for the camera. Even when I think I'm being still, there's enough shaking around that I get motion sick watching what I recorded.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dog Blasting

customer_reviews.title: good investment
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the purchase. and the customer service from Kevin and his quick response to any of my doubts, excellent glasses I use to record my son's soccer games, and even when I'm driving, and it is very clear the image I can assure you the same or better than soloshot video cameras and the best and easiest way to download and watch videos
customer_reviews.author: LUIS FLORES

customer_reviews.title: Obvious camera sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: They are so obvious that they something more than just sunglasses. Huge sides and a hole right down the center. For convert situations its a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: Update: Tried uploading video but never worked... Ugh Everything perfect except the angle is so tiny and looks to far up. The video is me backing up a 53ft trailer and the whole time i think im staring right at the back of trailer. I know how tight the angle is and was still disappointed. It's useless to me now. I really thought i nailed the video this time but no lol....sucks. Quality of vid is nice though
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice video and photos highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to use and it takes very good quality video and photos. Received next day and was using after short charge time was completed! Need indicator light in viewing are for all functions
customer_reviews.author: Carl L

customer_reviews.title: Camera Video Sunglasses,1080P Full HD Video Recording Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these cam glasses but mines arrived defective. It was dead on arrival. I went buy peoples so called honest reviews but apparently the reviews are all true. Buy at your own risk Amazonians !!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy! They turn on when they want to turn on. Waste of time and money..
customer_reviews.author: Nick Finelli

customer_reviews.title: Will update.
customer_reviews.text: So right off that bat, these thing are really bulky and goofy looking. Don't really feel good on the face either. I haven't plugged them into my computer yet to see the quality of the video. Will update that later.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle Rick

customer_reviews.title: Works better for me than my GoPro
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made. It is super easy to use. The picture quality is better than my GoPro. The audio is also very good. I don't really have anything negative to say about the glasses. The customer support is superb.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses camera
customer_reviews.text: Very neat! Took a few minutes for us to get used to knowing if it was recording but it actually is very easy to use! Really good quality videos! These are great for sports games and hunting! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived fast and we are excited to use these! Instructions are easy and looking forward to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Cantsleep

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used yet...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how quickly it came, the packaging was very good. All pieces and part's were in the box. The instructions are easily understood. Will update when I use them
customer_reviews.author: Mageroo

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and protective
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style and the eye protection from UV light. I will be using mostly for driving and fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last in rain
customer_reviews.text: Broke first time using in rain. Says they are water resistant just don’t submerge them. View is a little narrow. Would be satisfied if didn’t break from day 1
customer_reviews.author: matthew andrakin

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses arrived quickly, fit like a glove and really look nice on your face. I needed to return these and customer service was prompt and professional in handling the refund
customer_reviews.author: Adam L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work on my computer
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't recognize my computer once I plug it in. Why?? Seems it is missing something.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Sumislaski

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a negative review because the timestamp could not be turned off. I use Shotcut Video Editing software which has a nice image stabilization filter. However, using the stabilization filter caused the time stamp to jump all over the screen. The company responded by changing the glasses so that the timestamp can now be turned off and sending me a new set of glasses. Just go into the SportDV.txt file, change UPDATE:N to UPDATE:Y and set RTCDisplay:0 to turn off the timestamp. Theses are great glasses for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pictures, sound of this product is exceptional. I describe this recording sunglasses as great ! I'm very please with my purchase, and I will buy more in a future. I highly recommend this amazing product, very useful and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: I Know It

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had this product 10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had something like this 10 years ago. I would have recorded so many beautiful memories from my travels. Wonderful product and I'm already looking forward to using these sunglasses to record more wonderful memories for my youtube channel.
customer_reviews.author: Saquib Masud

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Look like the Matrix character but great product great videos, discreet videoing, fits comfortably even though it runs big on me as a small frame person. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: A cool gadget!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit tight, but that could be due to the fact I have a big head, LOL. They don’t take pictures but I actually like that because with the other sunglasses I always got confused as to, is it in pic or video mode?! Super easy controls. And the video quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: GSDMOM

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, 12 year old's you tube go-to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my son, who is a huge roller coaster buff. He LOVES it- he uses it to POV coaster rides and then posts to his you tube channel. I was worried he wouldn't be able to use it, or that the picture quality wouldn't be very good, but was wrong on both counts. Very nice quality, and my son grabbed it out of the box and started using it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted something that I could wear and get natural images of my dogs. Everyone always shies away when I break out a camera or cell phone and photo/video always looks staged. This did the trick! I have video and can extract stills from that which give me full personality of my kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: skbdallas

customer_reviews.title: 1 touch recording.  User friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly. 1 touch recording and easy to download to your PC. I'm CHI TAO self-defense, I teach law as in law enforcement. This product will assist me in teaching students how to document any future harrassment or physical assaults. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera higher than eye view
customer_reviews.text: My first, it was easy to use both glasses n to computer....the camera is higher than my eye view--- so I have to look a bit lower to get it pwrfect--- ualoty is more than decent. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Barcenas\m/

customer_reviews.title: Great look and great utility
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking sports-stylish glasses. Very comfortable and good quality lens. The camera does not add much in the way of additional bulk. The camera system is one touch. Great picture. Good sound pick-up. Very easy to use single button on/rec - off. No special software. Shows up as a drive on Windows 10 when connected by USB and the files are in standard .MOV format.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. Cam works great. Sharp video sharp images. Easy to operate. Use on the go. Just click the button on the side and you recording.
customer_reviews.author: OF

customer_reviews.title: update of original review
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to use with just one button to use. My major complaint is there is a reddish looking tint in the play back videos. Also the camera has a difficult time adjusting to different lighting. Maybe a weak processor. update I have given mingsung 5 stars based on their customer service and the fact they stand behind their products and were very helpful in solving my problem. thanks again
customer_reviews.author: j.tulong

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up 👌🏾👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: So far, amazing videos. Clear and sharp. One click you on. just wish when it's recording the light would stay on or show a different light when recording.
customer_reviews.author: William Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses. Clear videos. Fragile frame
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. Clear videos. Cool looking sunglasses. Update as of 07-25-20. It just broke when I took it off my face. Very gentle, not using force at all but is snapped out like butter. Guess 8months is its lifespan. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Zack Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Just got package in. These seem to be a pretty solid pair of glasses. Will update once I have a chance to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Cam
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't care for is the USB port door. Flimsy rubber. Good to have the protection, but must be better method/design.
customer_reviews.author: D Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. This was my second purchase since I was so pleased with the first and am probably going to buy a third one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer service and support. Quick delivery and positive results. Great purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne Howard

customer_reviews.title: ABOUT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: THE LOOKS ARE GREAT! THE COMFORTABLE IS HALF BECAUSE IT DOES HURT A BIT, FOR PRICE THE CLEARNESS AND SOUND IS NOT THE BEST AND COULD BE ALOT BETTER AND FAST MOVEMENT IS TOO MUCH FOR THIS DEVICE TO HANDLE
customer_reviews.author: (NIGHT SHADOW GHOST HUNTERS) OWNER: CHRISTOPHER LAZARICK

customer_reviews.title: camera glasses
customer_reviews.text: glasses comfortable. cannot rate functions yet...on charging mode before first use as per instructions
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit at first I was sceptical but they work very good. Style isn't to great. But so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Zrx12

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this item but am completely happy with it, clear videos, easy to get onto computer. Only thing that would make it even better is if there were some image stabilizer on the videos as they can get a bit shaky if you don't keep your head still.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but may not be ideal for motorcycle or mountain bikes
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is decent and easy to use. I bought it to capture some shots from my motorcycle rides but it was hard to tell when the camera is on or off from the tiny LED on the side. I wish the blinking LED was a bit further up to the front of the glasses so you could see it blinking but also not a distraction. I will keep the product for low speed rides.
customer_reviews.author: Aby Verghese

customer_reviews.title: Useful for gathering evidence
customer_reviews.text: These record video and audio in public areas. They are useful for evidence gathering.
customer_reviews.author: shinyhalo

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: video quality is very good and audio is good only had for a short time period so far very pleased
customer_reviews.author: fld1apple

customer_reviews.title: Camera angle
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are good video is good the only problem is that the camera is pointed up to high on the frames and video doesn't record were your looking, I put foam on the arms were they ride on your ears so they tilt down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great value not very comfy though
customer_reviews.text: Everything except comfortable. It does shoot a bit high. Next version perhaps tilt it 100 down angle to capture a more accurate field of vision but great item so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Avakian

customer_reviews.title: Easiest photo glasses on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. I recently purchased a different brand and they were horrible. So many buttons, card didn’t work, etc. These glasses come with the card installed, one button controls all, sturdy make, hooks right to the computer with no hoops to jump through!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cowell

customer_reviews.title: Got it to record my rides.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but not with a motorcycle helmet. I always wear a helmet so it won't do what I want it to do. But i tested it. Good pictures and video. Would work better for a bicycle rider.
customer_reviews.author: Big Spender

customer_reviews.title: Words cannot describe how great these are
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the title of this review, these glasses are amazing. The video and picture quality are amazing. I was blown away ay how crisp and clear the quality is. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: seems pretty good, will update after i try it this weekend and learn to use it better
customer_reviews.author: theinapropriateredneck

customer_reviews.title: Good protection while driving
customer_reviews.text: Used while driving , to prove what really happens while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good product and recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: That’s what I need for my car project!!! Good quality- easy to use to download the video file to the computer. Easy to take out the memory card. The design overall great: On/off button on the side works conveniently. Good for riding motorcycle car and good for any project to record to show what u are doing and then u can share on YouTube or Facebook!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John the Car Fun

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I like the quality of the video. Comes in a nice case and is easy to use. Overall very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Gonzalez Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Hands-Free High Quality Camera
customer_reviews.text: Volume is great! - picked up audio pretty easily and clear. No additional accessories needed to watch the recorded videos. Just connect the USB to your glasses and computer (Mac or PC) and watch! One note: I would recommend recording a few times, just so you can figure out the camera level.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nunnally

customer_reviews.title: Easy spying
customer_reviews.text: Comes with SD card. Convenient for when you want to be incognito.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Product stop working after 2 days of receiving it!! Very disappointed! Will not buy from this seller
customer_reviews.author: cesar ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Okay i guess not
customer_reviews.text: I hade it charging to my new laptop ,for 1 minute and my laptop turn blue , it corrupted my new laptop . It cost me almost 200 dollars to fix it. Not it keeps crashing everytime i restart my laptop . Everything is okay but it getts really hot when im using them after 5 minutes . So its okay but i wonder if i got a bad one ?

customer_reviews.title: Glasses don't work
customer_reviews.text: They did not work properly, feel like money was wasted

customer_reviews.title: These are cutting edge.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool! I am amazed that sunglasses do videos. These work well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use!! Basically came ready to roll. I got this for my husband, very outdoorsy guy but not the most tech savvy & he had a blast using & recording his airsoft event! We're even thinking of getting a couple pair for his team!
customer_reviews.author: Plzblucky

customer_reviews.title: Good quality , great price
customer_reviews.text: Like easy operation. Dislike not knowing how to remove micro sd card
customer_reviews.author: freezerguy

customer_reviews.title: Recorded mostly ground when I was lower bars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for cycling. Everything was good except for the angle when I rode the lower bars. Picture was mainly of ground in front of me. Tried a variety of things to change this. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bland

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for my Money
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good. I am having issues transferring the video files but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value for dollars
customer_reviews.text: Was surprisingly easy to use. Video quality is awesome. Able to view videos on chrome book, notebook & PC with no issue. WOW
customer_reviews.author: George T

customer_reviews.title: That size won't fit every one the same way..May leave a space between the handles and your temple
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well..Very unique.. They fitted a bit bigger than expected..That's the only down side

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Quality audio/video from this product! The glasses are stylish and the camera feature is very discreet and very user friendly.

customer_reviews.title: Missing information and overall look on the face.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't look nice on the face. Polarized which not mentioned in the advertisement which make difficult to use every where.

customer_reviews.title: Never realize these are so cool to you try them.
customer_reviews.text: Feel like special ops, 007 with these. Buttons on glasses are easy to work, good settings, it comes with sd card is a plus, and the picture quality is decent. Oh recharges fast, while lasting 6 hours. Only if it could record longer than 5 minutes per clip would be great
